# ewoksxrdct

The **ewoksxrdct** project is a Python library designed to provide workflow tasks for XRD-CT data processing using Ewoks (Extensible Workflow System).

## Installation

If you wish to install `ewoksxrdct` manually, ensure you have Python 3.10+ and `pip` installed. You can install the library directly from PyPI:

```sh
pip install ewoksxrdct
```

Alternatively, to install from source, clone this repository and run:

```sh
git clone https://gitlab.esrf.fr/workflow/ewoksapps/ewoksxrdct
cd ewoksxrdct
pip install -e .
```

## Documentation

Comprehensive documentation, including an API reference, tutorials, and conceptual explanations, can be found in the [doc directory](./doc) or online at the [ReadTheDocs page](https://ewoksxrdct.readthedocs.io/).
